name: Stalin Game Console
description:
Welcome comrade to ultimate Soviet gaming experience Stalin Game Console.

Our great leader tovarisch Stalin enabled the Soviet people to play the best games with amazing graphic and superb gameplay.Get your Stalin Game Console now comrade or go to gulag.

Desktop controls Stalin racing and Comunist balls with arrows.Capitalist invaders arrows and space for shooting.

Soviet anthem chiptune BITboy

Most assets Pngegg
